name: The Deadly Dawn
description:
Plot:

The world was taken over by zombie dogs with their weapons and you must now save it.

Controls:

--> Use A and D or left and right arrow keys to move left and right respectively.

--> Use the W  , up arrow or space bar to jump.

--> Use the scroll bar to switch between weapons, u start with a pistol by default, but there is an ar and grenade launcher as well.

--> Left click is for shooting and the guns follow the mouse for aiming by default.

made by CerealChiller and Naught

this is our first game jam so we are happy with how its turned out
